credit_line: Gift of Merritt A. Boyle, grandson of General Merritt Barber, Class of 1857
title: Two Kiowas
inscriptions: u.l. in pencil: 13.; on mount, below image in ink: Two Kiawas.  The one on the right, the Big Old Man was killed by the 4th Cavalry in the/ fall of 1874.  The other was alive at the time this picture was made (1880)
